Package cs350s22.component.sensor.watchdog

Class A_Watchdog

java.lang.Object
cs350s22.component.sensor.watchdog.A_Watchdog
Direct Known Subclasses:
A_WatchdogDouble, A_WatchdogSingle
public abstract class A_Watchdog extends Object
Defines the shared elements of a watchdog, which reports when a value is out of compliance.
